
=head1 NAME

relationship

=head1 DESCRIPTION

The blessed semantic web relationships.

=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - A fully qualified semantic web relationship.
 description (character varying) - A description of the relationship.


=head1 SCHEMA

                                           Table "gcis_metadata.relationship"
    Column    |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Stats target |                 Description                  
 -------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+--------------+----------------------------------------------
  identifier  | character varying | not null  | extended |              | A fully qualified semantic web relationship.
  description | character varying |           | extended |              | A description of the relationship.
 Indexes:
     "relationship_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "term_map" CONSTRAINT "term_map_relationship_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (relationship_identifier) REFERENCES relationship(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT
     TABLE "term_rel" CONSTRAINT "term_rel_relationship_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (relationship_identifier) REFERENCES relationship(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON relationship FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON relationship FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
